container.heading: Selling and Dispensing of Contact Lenses

para.text: In this chapter, the following terms have the meanings indicated.
"Contact lens" means a medical device of any material or power, including plano or zero-powered, that is placed directly on:

"Contact lens prescription" means "replacement contact lens prescription" as defined in Health Occupations Article, §11-404.4, Annotated Code of Maryland, and any federal statute and regulations that may supersede this Health Occupations citation.

section.heading: Sales and Dispensing of Contact Lenses.
section.text: Contact lens prescriptions and contact lenses are prescribed, sold, dispensed, and otherwise regulated as stated in Health Occupations Article, §11-404.4, Annotated Code of Maryland, and any federal statute and regulations that may supersede this Health Occupations citation.

annotations.annotation:
Health-General Article, §24-301.1;
Health Occupations Article, §§11-101, 11-205, and 11-404.4; Annotated Code of Maryland
